scripts.backend: cd backend && concurrently "nodemon collaboration-service/socket-io.js" "nodemon question-service/server.js" "nodemon user-service/postgresql.js" "nodemon history-service/history.js" "nodemon matching-service/match-service.js"
scripts.install-all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install && cd collaboration-service && npm install && cd ../history-service && npm install && cd ../matching-service && npm install && cd ../question-service && npm install && cd ../user-service && npm install
